E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 2/17/1988
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Derrick Castrejon



Date: Sunday, 2/23/1988
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with Northeastern!

Regards,
Derrick Castrejon



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Status of Phillip Gephart
Dear Sir,
Phillip Gephart isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Patriot Games!
He has an AVG of .214, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of German Usera
Dear Sir,
German Usera has nothing more to prove at AA Patriot Games!
He has an ERA of 3.86 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/7/1988
Subject: Status of Ronald Petrone
Dear Sir,
Ronald Petrone shouldn't play at AA Patriot Games!
He has an AVG of .246 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
